arge.title: R&D and Production
arge.subtitle: Our R&D and Factory
arge.description: Our company maintains its leadership in the sector by continuously integrating technology with innovations. In our R&D (Research and Development) department, we follow the latest innovations in the sector and work continuously to integrate them into our products. We continue to develop innovative solutions and continue our investments without slowing down to be a pioneer in the global market.

card1.title: High Technology Production
items: We accelerate production processes with state-of-the-art machines.
We use robotic systems that increase efficiency.
We adopt environmentally friendly production techniques.

card2.title: Advanced R&D Studies
items: We conduct continuous research on new product development.
We carry out R&D projects for innovative solutions.
We invest in the latest technologies by following developments in the sector.

card3.title: Sustainable Production
items: We produce with environmentally friendly materials.
We develop waste management and recycling applications.

bottomSection.title: Technology Base
bottomSection.description: In our factory, we provide the best service to our customers by combining high-quality production processes with the latest technologies. We gain competitive advantage in the sector with our high-capacity production facilities, environmentally friendly production approach, and sustainable solutions.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: Our company maintains its leadership in the industry by leveraging the power of technology and innovation. Our mission is to adapt to continuously evolving and changing technologies while providing quality service to our customers. We are among the leaders in the industry in providing high-quality products and services.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To provide value to all our stakeholders in the industry by combining technology with a human-centered approach. We aim to be a leading brand in the global market.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To improve our customers' business processes and deliver more value each day by continuously developing innovative solutions. We use our workforce and resources most efficiently for sustainability.

items.title: Trust
items.description: We adopt the principle of building trust-based relationships with our customers and always being honest and transparent.

items.title: Teamwork
items.description: We aim to achieve success through strong teamwork and contribute to the development of each team member.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We keep pace with and pioneer changes in the industry by continuously developing and producing innovative solutions.

software.text1: Empowering businesses with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled expertise

items.title: AI Solutions
items.description: Cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions for complex problems.

items.title: Machine Learning
items.description: Advanced machine learning models and algorithms for predictive analytics.

items.title: Big Data Analytics
items.description: Insights from large-scale data analysis to drive business decisions.

items.title: IoT Integration
items.description: Seamless Internet of Things connectivity for smart ecosystems.

items.title: Computer Vision
items.description: Visual data processing and analysis for image and video understanding.

items.title: Software Development
items.description: Custom software solutions tailored to your specific needs.

items.title: Biometric Systems
items.description: Advanced biometric authentication and identification systems.

items.title: Game Development
items.description: Immersive and engaging game experiences across platforms.

items.title: Video Analytics
items.description: Intelligent video analysis for security and business insights.

solutions.title: Global Reach
solutions.description: Serving clients across continents with localized solutions

solutions.title: Security First
solutions.description: Implementing robust security measures in all our solutions

solutions.title: Rapid Deployment
solutions.description: Quick turnaround times without compromising on quality

solutions.title: Collaborative Approach
solutions.description: Working closely with clients to ensure project success

solutions.title: Data-Driven Insights
solutions.description: Leveraging analytics to drive informed decision-making

innovative.subtitle: Shaping the future with our innovative technologies

security.subtitle: Protect your business with modern security systems

medical.title: Medical Technologies
medical.subtitle: Innovative solutions for the healthcare sector

b2b.title: Grow Your Business with Nokta B2B
b2b.description: Join our B2B platform for wholesale purchasing, special pricing, and more. Take advantage of our exclusive benefits for corporate customers.

pricing.title: Special Pricing
pricing.description: Special prices and discounts on bulk purchases. Gain competitive advantage for your projects.

delivery.title: Priority Delivery
delivery.description: Fast delivery and stock priority for our B2B customers. Don't disrupt your business processes.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Technical support and dedicated solution center. Our expert team is always by your side.

security.title: Security Solutions
security.subtitle: Cutting-edge Protection
security.description: Our state-of-the-art CCTV systems and fire alarm products are designed to keep your premises safe and secure. With advanced features like AI-powered threat detection and real-time alerts, you can have peace of mind knowing your property is protected 24/7.

fire.title: Fire Detection Systems
fire.description: Protect your business 24/7 with state-of-the-art fire detection and alarm systems. Smart sensors and real-time monitoring enable immediate response.

cctv.title: CCTV Systems
cctv.description: Elevate your premises security with high-resolution camera systems and advanced recording features. AI-powered motion detection and facial recognition.

barrier.title: Barrier and Parking Solutions
barrier.description: Professional solutions with automatic barrier systems, license plate recognition, and smart parking management. Complete control with toll integration and visitor tracking system.

medical.title: Medical Electronics
medical.subtitle: Advanced Healthcare Technology
medical.description: Our cutting-edge electronic products are designed for modern healthcare facilities and hospitals. From patient monitoring systems to advanced diagnostic tools, we provide innovative solutions that improve patient care and streamline medical processes.

nurse.title: Nurse Call Systems
nurse.description: IP-based nurse call systems specially designed for hospitals and healthcare facilities. Complete solution with emergency button, bedside unit, and nurse station control panel.

clock.title: Central System Clocks
clock.description: Digital and analog clocks with GPS/NTP synchronization. Fully automatic clock systems for hospitals, schools, and corporate buildings. High precision and easy management.

pager.title: Pager and Room Control Systems
pager.description: Wireless paging devices and smart room control panels. Integrated systems for staff calls, patient tracking, and room automation. Easy installation and operation.

software.title: Software Solutions
software.subtitle: Innovative Digital Solutions
software.description: Our team of expert developers creates custom software solutions tailored to your business needs. From enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems to mobile applications, we deliver innovative digital solutions that drive efficiency and growth for your organization.
